feed.title: SAP Community - SAP NetWeaver
feed.subtitle: SAP NetWeaver Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Transferring tile settings configured in Fiori Launchpad
entry.content:
I want to configure tiles on the Fiori launchpad of the development machine and transfer the tile settings to the verification machine.

① Will the information for the sections configured on the page and the added tiles be transferred along with the page transfer?
② When transferring roles, will the assigned spaces also be transferred?

entry.title: Can Install / Run SAP Tune in a running system?
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We would like to install/run SAPtune in running BW DEV and QAS systems. Is this possible? What is the impact, is there an outage for this? 

Thank you

entry.title: \/CPMB/LOAD_INFOPROV_UI - Error obtaining concurrency lock (foreign_lock)
entry.content:
With reference to Incident 676338/2025:

Currently, we are experiencing performance issues when submitting data to the BPC system due to high data volume.

SAP Max Attention onboarded in May and recommended adjusting the RECLEVLEL_NR parameter to values such as 20,000, 50,000, 70,000, or 100,000.

We applied RECLEVLEL_NR = 70,000 in our QA environment and performed regression testing to identify any 'concurrency lock' issues during the load or BADI process.

We found one specific case where the DM package '/CPMB/LOAD_INFOPROV_UI' failed with the error: 'Error obtaining concurrency lock (foreign_lock)'.

Please refer the attachment contains the steps to reproduce the issue in QDP system

Thank you

Regards

Samy

entry.title: Slow TP/STMS on iSeries
entry.content:
Hi,

in a ECC EHP8 landscape (3 systems, dev, qty and prd) on iSeries, each tp and/or STMS operations are very slow, such as 4:30 for a CR release of a simple single field on customizing table.

General performance are quite good, 300-350ms.

The issue is present from few months but users are not able to when extaclty, mybe when they have changed from old HW to newst.

It's a V7R4 box

SAP Kernel : 753
Make Variant : 753_REL
Database Client Library : DB4_71

Have you got any idea or suggest?

At this moment I can't login into a 5250 session but I hope it in next days.

Thank you.

entry.title: Query on using Virtual Hostnames in Windows servers
entry.content:
Hi Team,

 

We are building new SAP systems on Windows[using virtual hostnames] to migrate current landscape which is also on Windows but uses physical hostname.

 

We are retaining old physical hostname as virtual hostname in new builds

 

As per note DIGITS, we have disabled DNS registry and used skipassource option for SAP system installations. Our network team has below questions for firewall and NSG settings to be adopted.

  1. changes done as part of note DIGITS are permanent? because DNS registry needs enabling for virtual hostname after cutover
  2. Is note DIGITS applicable for builds on Azure Cloud.
  3. Which IP is used as source for outbound connections as skipassource parameter is set and all outbound data goes through this IP. Share available article/note for the same 
  4. As per DIGITS IP and hostname should resolve to each other. If we set skipassource, for outbound SAP application data will it work as OS IP will be used to send out data
  5. In a distributed system though ASCS/ERS are using cluster IP and load balancer, for application servers we intend to use virtual hostnames, is this supported and points of DIGITS can be used.

 

We had a detailed discussion with our network team and checked all SAP Notes DIGITS,DIGITS,DIGITS and installation guide 

 

NW7XX_inst_abap_win_sql.pdf, but the answers are not clear.

 

Kindly, answer above questions for us to proceed further with builds and take required precautions.

 

regards

 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: SAP APO deleting an order in the planning board, makes other process orders disappear
entry.content:
Issue happens in scheduling board in 000 version: if the user deletes an order in the schedule of sequenced process/planned orders, and doesn"t save.

After deletion, the user drags/pushes the first remaining "sequence" of orders to the expected start date a bit further in future.

When doing this, the whole train of orders vanishes.

This problem does not occur in SIM. So it probably has to do with the connection to S4

After saving or refreshing, the orders re-appear

/SAPAPO/CDPS0 - Detailed Scheduling Planning Board - Variable View

entry.content:

entry.title: SOST Transcation taking long time to open / Ending up with TIME OUT Dump
entry.content:
Issue  : 

  • It took very long time to display the send requests in SOST
  • Or it ended with following runtime error

          Category ABAP programming error
          Runtime Errors TIME_OUT
          ABAP Program SAPLSX11
          Application Component BC-SRV-COM

          Short Text
          Time limit exceeded

          What happened?
          Program "SAPLSX11" has exceeded the maximum uninterrrupted runtime and has
          therefore been terminated.

Cause : 

There are too many send requests in SAPConnect queue or SAPOffice tables contain huge amount of entries.

Resolution : 

Follow the SAP Note : 3164602 - It takes long time to open SOST or runtime error TIME_OUT occurs

Even if SAP Note solution doesn't work, Here is the solution :

Need to create secondary index to improve response time using below query : 

create index <SCHEMA>."SOES~<Index ID>" on <SCHEMA>."SOES" (MANDT, STATUS, SNDDAT, MSGTY)

Ex : create index SAPSR3."SOES~A1" on SAPSR3."SOES" (MANDT, STATUS, SNDDAT, MSGTY)

Note: Before implementing any changes directly in the Production system, always test them first in a Development or Quality environment. This helps ensure stability, prevents unexpected disruptions, and validates the solution safely.

entry.title: Connect SAP BW NW 7.5 with SAP S/4 HANA 2023 private cloud.
entry.content: Is SAP BW NW 7.5 compatible with SAP S/4 HANA 2023 private cloud?

entry.title: Standard SAP input fields have a limitation of 255 characters, for QR code processing need more
entry.content:
Standard SAP input fields have a limitation of 255 characters. For QR code processing, we require an input field capable of handling up to 600 characters in RF- Screen. While a custom control was developed In Module Pool Program and functional in SAP GUI, it fails to render in ITS Mobile environments, displaying compatibility error messages., While Doing Configurations as While Creating HTML Template by following Details Internet Service : ZMOB Theme : 99HTML Template Name : ZWM_FG_LT1F Screen Number : 9002 Generating Style : Mobile Device ( No HTML Tables )


--- Steps to Reproduce ---

Login the RF transaction: 

  1. LM01. 
    1. Inbound process
    2. Putaway verification
      1. Scan Pallet code
      2. QR code verification field (item) is not enabled in the WebURL/in Device (ITS Zebra device).

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Objects created in Shared Memory Area Class not persisted between ODATA Calls
entry.content:
We have implemented the ODATA service. Created a Area Class using transaction SHMA. When performing multiple odata calls and storing the data in the internal tables created in the area class. The data is not persisting in the internal tables and is getting refreshed for each ODATA call. There is something wrong with the persisting of internal tables

 

Need your help to troubleshoot the issue. Thanks

Best Regards,

Tejo

entry.title: Sold-To Party: not updated automatically for Some incident while creating Solman incident
entry.content:
Dear All,

Basically Sold-To Party: updated automatically when i create incident in ITSM. but Some incident its blank 

Please advise how to correct the error.

entry.title: Property calendarWeekNumbering does not exist in Element sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

after system upgrade, we have an error in various applications related to DatePicker object :

abap.js:64 Assertion failed: ManagedObject.apply: encountered unknown setting "calendarWeekNumbering" for class "sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month" (value:"Default")

We are on SAPUI5 1.71.75, and we have upgraded the SAPUI5 component from SAP_UI 754 0006 to SAP_UI 754 0008.

Applications works fine from WebIde and also in the landscape system that are still not upgraded.

Instead If we launch the application from Fiori Launchpad we have the issue.

Do you have some advice ? 

Thanks

Massimo

entry.title: Soamanager table storing proxy configuration
entry.content:
Helle All,
Could You tell me in which table I could find configuration of web services proxy?
I need to scan all defined proxy and identify old proxies but due to it's number, this activity is tedious.
It will be much easier to check specific table.

Kind Regards
Łukasz Karabowicz

entry.title: HR Mini master employee work schedule not showing in CM25.
entry.content:
Hi, I need help with HR mini master integration with Capacity planning board.

My goal for integrating HR master with capacity is to do capacity planning at the individual labor level based on their availability and qualifications. Should be able to assign individual labor from the pooled capacity to a particular Process order based on their work schedule and qualification in CM25.

I have configured the HR mini master, maintained qualifications and Planning work time (INFO TYPE= 007), the expectation is that this work time will show in CM25 for capacity planning based on availability. 

The employees are assigned to the work centers under Capacity HRMS. I can see these employees in CM25 using overall Profile "SAPSFCG005", but I do not see their work schedule, this is the problem. 

I'm attaching the screenshot of the configuration and CM25.

entry.title: Authorization trace filter for single object ?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

is there a way to trace only a single object (like S_TABU_DIS) over several users, to check when/if this authorization was used and on which transaction/process?

In STAUTHTRACE you can only filter object, but only for a completed trace (where all objects were traced).
But I dont want to trace everything, so tracing only with filter for object.

thank you.

entry.title: Im BW mit Routine Hashtag erstetzen
entry.content:
Hallo,

ich versuche '#' im String bei einer Feldzuweisung mit REPLACE zu ersetzen. leider wird '#' offenbar nicht als Zeichen interpretiert und nicht ersetzt.

Hat jemand eine Idee, wie ich hier weiterkommen?

Veiel Dank 

Johannes Borst-Rachor

entry.title: Error while extracting data: DataSource 0CO_PC_ACT_02, package 000000 Message no. RODPS_SAPI009
entry.content:
When I try to extract data from S4HANA using 0CO_PC_ACT_02 using ABAP code in the FISCPER selection (current period), after getting some data, the dataload job ends with an error in the source system message. I see only msg below, nothing more.

Error while extracting data: DataSource 0CO_PC_ACT_02, package 000000

Message no. RODPS_SAPI009

Please advise me how I can proceed here, as it is essential for us. Thank you.

entry.title: sap netwaver nord is missing in spro
Unable to replicate data from BW 7.5 DSO to Datasphere
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement to replicate a specific set of data from BW 7.5 (On-Premise) to SAP Datasphere. We have the connection to BW setup via the cloud connector but we cannot see any of the DSOs when creating a dataflow. The client does not intend to have DPA or BW Bridge.

How can we replicate the data directly to Datasphere (without migration to BW Bridge or use of DPA)? The record counts to be replicated can be in excess of 100M records

Thanks
